dxf2svg.svg
Class SvgImage

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.svg.SvgElement
      dxf2svg.svg.SvgReference
          dxf2svg.svg.SvgImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public final class SvgImage
extends SvgReference

This class encapsulates images that is imbedded in a DXF. The following are valid image formats for DXF:

  • JPG
  • PNG

If the image can be found from the URL at conversion time, it is embedded automatically. If it cannot be found, the URL is inserted instead because it is assumed that the image was not available at the time of conversion and will be added later. It may also be an image that changes frequently.

Version:
0.04 - August 23, 2005
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

setReferenceHandle

public void setReferenceHandle(java.lang.String imageHandle)
This method is called by the EntityProcessor and provides the dxf handle of the URL for this image. This is in turn, looked up in a vector of Dxf objects collected from the Dxf's OBJECT section.

Parameters:
imageHandle - reference collected from the entities section of the DXF.

getAttributes

Overrides:
getAttributes in class SvgElement
Returns:
StringBuffer of <image> attributes.

getReferenceURL

protected Attribute getReferenceURL()
This method returns the reference's URL in a normal reference object. However SvgImages need to also be able to embed their images as Base64 encoded data. This method makes that descision based on whether it can find the image; if it can it automatically embeds it, if it can't find the data then it will just use the URL like all other classes derived from the SvgReference class.

Overrides:
getReferenceURL in class SvgReference
Returns:
String preformatted URL link in the following format: xlink:href="reference" or the image as base64 encoded data.
